title: Trying to require a password to enter a yahoomail account
content:
On my computer, using Firefox, i would like to require a password to enter my yahoo account, for security reasons. 

At one point I had that status.      Now something is remembering my password and auto-signing me in.  How can I change settings to require a password. 
  I already tried changing my password and it still auto-signed in.

Appreciate any advice here!

David
creator: websterdavid31

title: Eliminar certificado no válido o revocado del navegador
content:
Buenos días

Intento eliminar un certificado emitido por la FNMT y después de dar a aceptar, el certirficado no desaparece. He reiniciado el navegador y el equipo también pero sigue ahí. Instalé un nuevo certificado pero la presencia del anterior me impide validar en actual. Tampoco puedo hacer copia o exportarlo a otro dispositivo desde el navegador.

Gracias
creator: araceli.perezheras

title: Cattura schermata scomparso
content:
Salve a tutti,

ho Firefox 95.0.2 su Win10.

Mi è scomparso il tasto Cattura schermata, quello con la forbice e il riquadro tratteggiato. Ce l'avevo sulla barra degli strumenti ma non c'è più. Per risolvere il problema ho già provato le seguenti cose:

  • Cercare in "personalizza barra degli strumenti" ma non c'è
  • "Ripristina predefiniti" ma non c'è comunque
  • tasto dx su un qualsiasi punto della pagina web ma nell'elenco non c'è più neanche lì
  • combinazione ctrl+maiusc+s ma non succede nulla

Come posso fare a ripristinarlo? è una funzione comodissima di Firefox, grazie.
creator: deoxys99

title: Math formulas not displaying correctly in some instances of Firefox (but not all)
content:
Recently if I browse pages with maths forumulas they do not display coorectly, instead the underlying Tex or LateX code is shown.

I have several computers and I use Firefox on all of them, but curiously this problem does not happen on all of them, some show formulae correctly.

The image attached shows an example at Wikipedia - Lagrange point . The upper portion is Chrome and displays correctly, the lower portion is Firefox where the formyuals do not display correctly.

This is only started recently. Previously I had no issues with formulas displaying on any pf my computers, for many years.
creator: ChrisJ7903

title: I want Google from a blank search and/or in new tab
content:
I want to get google by pressing enter with nothing written in new tab search bar or address bar (how it used to work). Any way to get it back? I know it's not exactly a recent change, but it's been annoying me more lately.

If not that, I'd like to set google for new tab. I don't understand why homepage has option for custom url, but not new tab.
creator: alexshiro

title: Браузер имеет скрытый id пользователя?
content:
Заметил, что авторизованная сессия (логин пароль) https://discord.com/ сохраняется даже после удаления всей истории. (Clear Recent History/everything/all checkboxes). Сессия удалилась после удаления папки profile напрямую с жесткого диска. Почему? Браузер имеет скрытый id пользователя? Но тогда это огромная дыра в безопасности.

translate.google.com I noticed that the authorized session (login password) https://discord.com/ persists even after deleting the entire history (Clear Recent History/everything/all checkboxes). The session was deleted after deleting the profile folder directly from the hard drive. Why? Does the browser have a hidden user id? But then this is a huge security hole.
creator: ildragone888888

title: Size of Icons of the extensions, buttons, etc on the toolbar is impossibly small.
content:
Linux distribution: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS Firefox version: latest

I really, really need something to increase the size of all the icons in the toolbar. The size of the text is fine, but surprisingly the size of the icons is ridiculously small.

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1260063

This thread does not help me, because for some reason the value '1.5' decreases the size, and the value '2' makes no difference at all.

A happy new year to everybody.
creator: anmol

title: "new sign-in alert" for websites that I regularly visit with Firefox
content: Hi, I get emails notifying me of "new sign-in alert" for websites that I regularly visit with Firefox 95.02 on my Mac. For example, my wife's GMail account, eBay etc. I suspect my privacy settings and would welcome help! Chris
creator: chris442

title: Trying to edit "Collection details" on AMO - error
content:
I have an existing collection of extensions on AMO, I can add and remove extensions from it and add my notes to the extensions, but if I try and edit the collection info (name, description and custom URL), it incorrectly errors, claiming I have invalid characters in the custom url. Even if I don't actually change anything when I hit "Edit", I can't save, I have to cancel out.

I don't really care too much but probably someone should take a look at some point.

There isn't a forum for the website specifically, so posting under FF desktop as that is browser I was using when this occurred (FF Win10 x86-64, Dev edition)
creator: kelly.account.ffsync
